item.description:
We will continue working on our altered books, and share any tips and techniques we have found while working on them. We will also discuss what our next group project will be - probably something involving the wooden boxes we have in the studio. Bring suggestions and ideas!

Newcomers are always welcome. If this is your first time joining us, bring a hardcover book, a ruler, glue, and some images to work with.
item.how_to_find_us: Go up the stairs to the right to the second floor.

group.name: The Altered Art and Assemblage Meetup Group

item.name: Altered Art November Meetup
